issue.title: [CF 1139] Cannot configure icon
issue.body:
Hello,

I cannot configure tellmewhen. download the 7.3.5. I try to delete all the tellmewhen files in WTF folder.
Still have a message : " It looks like tellmewhen or tellmewhen_option has fail to initialize..." and says to post lua error over there.
The icon that have been configure before the issue ocur still works (visible when proc, with cooldown...).
/tmw show me the box, i can move the groups on the screen, but right click do not open the configuration window. T_T

=====================================
Message: Interface\AddOns\TellMeWhen\Options\AceOptions.lua:1076: attempt to call method 'SetDefaultSize' (a nil value)
Time: 07/16/15 10:22:03
Count: 1
Stack: (tail call): ?
Interface\AddOns\TellMeWhen\Options\AceOptions.lua:1076: in function `CompileOptions'
Interface\AddOns\TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen.lua:3686: in function `LoadOptions'
Interface\AddOns\TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen.lua:3177: in function `UpdateNormally'
Interface\AddOns\TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen.lua:3348: in function `Update'
Interface\AddOns\TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen.lua:1868: in function `?'
...igs\Libs\CallbackHandler-1.0\CallbackHandler-1.0.lua:147: in function <...igs\Libs\CallbackHandler-1.0\CallbackHandler-1.0.lua:147>
[string "safecall Dispatcher[1]"]:4: in function <[string "safecall Dispatcher[1]"]:4>
[C]: ?
[string "safecall Dispatcher[1]"]:13: in function `?'
...igs\Libs\CallbackHandler-1.0\CallbackHandler-1.0.lua:92: in function `Fire'
...face\AddOns\ElvUI\libs\AceEvent-3.0\AceEvent-3.0.lua:120: in function <...face\AddOns\ElvUI\libs\AceEvent-3.0\AceEvent-3.0.lua:119>

Locals: <none>
=====================================

I'm completely lost if it does not work, help me ! :)

Thanks,
StrateGeyti.


> Posted by CurseForge user StrateGeyti | Imported from CurseForge issue #1139 | Raw

comments.body:
Attachment Added: output.jpg

output.jpg

<p>Dat loop</p>


> Posted by CurseForge user StrateGeyti

Hey,

The lua error in the previews post occur when i right click on the group (in order to configure the icon...)

I have another lua error when a fight come at its end :

=======================

Locals: <none>

=======================

Hope this can help too.


> Posted by CurseForge user StrateGeyti

Are there any other Lua errors that you're getting (even ones that don't mention TellMeWhen - the problem could definitely be getting caused by something that another addon is doing).

Also, could you paste this command into chat and then take a screenshot of the output for me?

/run for k,v in pairs(LibStub("AceConfigDialog-3.0"))do print(k,v)end

Edited Jul 16, 2015

> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Thanks for reply.

I enable other addons one by one and i figure out that "iskar assist" is the one which makes tmw not work.

I take the picture of the output, but how can i send it to you ?

I have 6 more lua errors only if "iskar assist" is enabled, shall i paste them here too ?


> Posted by CurseForge user StrateGeyti

The other errors would be very helpful, yes.

You can attach files to the ticket with the link on the top right side of this page.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

> Posted by CurseForge user StrateGeyti

I've determined that you're using v0.8a of Iskar Assist. This version has a bug in it with its load order (AceConfig getting loaded before AceGUI) that causes AceConfig to be destroyed. Update Iskar Assist to v0.9 and you should be good to go.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Thanks a lot ! :)


> Posted by CurseForge user StrateGeyti
